definition: lump (of earth)/chunk/piece/classifier for pieces of cloth, cake, soap etc/(coll.) classifier for money and currency units
root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)

sentences.english: Cassava is a starch crop of which the product harvested is the root tubers.
sentences.chinese: 木薯是淀粉作物，收获的产品主要是块根。

sentences.english: Objective To study the chemical constituents of the volatile oil from Hedychium coronarium roots.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究姜花块根挥发油的化学成分。

sentences.english: This gravelly soil is well drained and good for growing root crops.
sentences.chinese: 这沙土地利于排水，适于种植块根作物。

sentences.english: Tapioca is starch obtained from tuberous roots of the bitter cassava, native of South America.
sentences.chinese: 木薯粉是南美本地产的苦薯的块根制作。

sentences.english: Cassava starch-rich roots, known as the "king of starch."
sentences.chinese: 木薯块根淀粉丰富，被誉为“淀粉之王”。

sentences.english: This week, we move from root vegetables to a leafy vegetable.
sentences.chinese: 本周，我们的话题将从块根类蔬菜转移到多叶蔬菜。

sentences.english: Root cylindric , to 2 cm in diam. Caudex short, simple or rarely branched.
sentences.chinese: 圆筒状的根，在2厘米直径块根短，单或很少分枝。

sentences.english: Through the study on the cultural technique of artificial domestication of Clitocybe conglobata (Vitt.
sentences.chinese: 通过对块根蘑人工驯化栽培技术的研究。
多年生植物的具纺锤形的块根。

sentences.english: Guan-fu base A is a new alkaloid isolated from the root ef Aconitum Coreanum.
sentences.chinese: 关附甲素是从关白附子块根中提取的一种新生物碱。

sentences.english: Glutinous rehmannia's traditional for medicinal is the root tuber.
sentences.chinese: 地黄的传统药用部位是块根，为“四大怀药”之一。

sentences.english: A group of farmers are digging up the root crop cassava.
sentences.chinese: 一队农夫正在挖木薯块根作物。

sentences.english: Tapioca is starch obtained from tuberous roots of the bitter cassava native of south america.
sentences.chinese: 木薯粉是南美本地产的苦薯的块根制作。

sentences.english: Sugar juice purity is high, the root quality is good.
sentences.chinese: 糖汁纯度高，块根品质好。
